title: How can technology help build a community and bring us together? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think much more simplified high tech in order to be able to operate without asking anyone to help you. Check out what the Japanese are cooking the high tech, I’m very impressed by their brilliant brain and wise action.
It could. However, technology is only able to provide the medium, not make us better persons. That is on us. As far as I can see, it brings us further apart than ever, in a way.
